p: The study of bioactive foods useful in the prevention and management of metabolic diseases including obesity and diabetes is a topic of great interest for researchers in the area of food science. To our knowledge, no previous studies have investigated the species Hypochaeris and Hyoseris for their ability to inhibit carbohydrate-hydrolyzing and lipase enzymes. All investigated samples exerted inhibitory activity on enzymes linked to obesity and DMT2 in a concentration dependent manner ( Table 5).
